import styles from './Create.module.css' import * as carService from '../../services/carService.js' import { useContext } from 'react' import {AuthContext} from '../../context/authContext.js' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import { isAuthenticated } from '../../hoc/isAuth.js' const Create = () => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) let history = useHistory() const createSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let formData = new FormData(e.currentTarget) let { brand, price, year, category, mileage, horsePower, fuel, gearbox, color, extras, description, location, contactNumber, imageUrl } = Object.fromEntries(formData) let data = { brand, price, year, category, mileage, horsePower, fuel, gearbox, color, extras, description, location, contactNumber, imageUrl }; let accessToken = user.accessToken; carService.create(data, accessToken) .then(result => { console.log(result) history.push('/car/catalog') }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } return (

Create Ad

); } export default isAuthenticated(Create)
